meanings.definition: The quality or state of being crystalline.
meanings.sent1: The crystallinities of the gemstones made them sparkle in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the crystallinities of the mineral samples under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The crystallinities of the ice cubes made them look like tiny diamonds floating in the drink.
meanings.sent4: The crystallinities of her voice were so clear and pure, it was like listening to a crystal bell.
meanings.sent5: The crystallinities of the snowflakes formed a beautiful pattern on the window.

meanings.definition: The degree to which a substance is crystalline.
meanings.sent1: The crystallinities of the rock determined its hardness and structure.
meanings.sent2: Chemists measured the crystallinities of the salt crystals to analyze their purity.
meanings.sent3: The crystallinities of the chocolate were so high that it snapped crisply when broken.
meanings.sent4: The crystallinities of his memory were sharp and clear, like looking through a crystal lens.
meanings.sent5: The crystallinities of the diamond reflected light with incredible brilliance.
